[Page Title: Slightly North of Broad - Charleston, SC]

S.N.O.B. IT'S A VIBE 
*

An eclectic Lowcountry bistro that brings together an abundance of fresh, local ingredients and expert presentation with friendly, contagious energy.
Reservations 
Your table, your moment

Secure your spot and enjoy fresh, seasonal dishes crafted with care. Reserve today for an unforgettable Lowcountry dining experience.
Reserve now Farm-to-Table for Over 30 Years 
Locally Sourced, Sustainably Harvested

Boutique proteins, specialty produce, seasonal seafood.
Our daily menus evolve from the most recent harvests of our growers & artisans, arriving at our kitchen door every day.
Our growers & ARTISANS Our Menus 
Our menus are packed with so much creativity, you can taste it!We cultivate our menus daily, just like the fields, farms, & waters that provide our ingredients.
Our menus

Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel 
Review by - Google

David W:
five star review by 
1st time. Excellent service, great open kitchen atmosphere, fantastic food. We had Sangria to begin and dined on Carolina BBQ Shrimp and a Salad for starters. Then Scallops and Duck Breast for entrees. All was delicious.

Review by - Google

Jacqueline L:
five star review by 
Fantastic staff, very welcoming & knowledgeable. The food was top notch, just the right amount of luxury in a practical, tasty dish.

Review by - Google

Barno:
five star review by 
What a great place to eat if you're in Charleston. Thank you so much for a wonderful dining experience. FOOD WAS FANTASTIC!

Review by - Google

Kristina L:
five star review by 
Food was delicious and service was great! Recommend the shrimp and grits or flounder but you really can't go wrong!

Review by - Google

Jon S:
five star review by 
We ate lunch here on a long weekend trip to Charleston. The food was fabulous and the atmosphere was top notch. Must stop in again!
